Tag Name: Development of Early Nerve Ring Neurons
Tag Contents: Depicts the development of early nerve ring neurons from birth to nerve ring closure. Neurons depicted express sfGPF driven by the lim-4 promoter. lim-4 expresses in 8 neuronal pairs during mid-embryonic development.
Author: Mark and Titas

Tag Contents: First segmented lim-4 positive cell born
This is the first instance when the expression is strong enough to allow for proper segmentation.
Possibly earlier and not visible till now.

Tag Name: Fasicle Formed Between SIAVL and SIBDL
Tag Contents: Presence of two cells indicated by striping.

Tag Name: Lim-4 expression is found in 8 neuron pairs
Tag Contents: This story highlights development of 3 of those 8 pairs
Occurs between comma and 1.5 fold stages of development. RIV and SMDV present.
